resources.string: 1941. You are a private soldier in USA army. You will get your mission objectives from Captain Miller. He is waiting for you near the aircraft.
Private. Your mission is to parachute down behind enemies front line,find the division Delta, and get them back home.
Now, you have your objective, you can prepare your inventory and then go to bar, may be for the last time.
Commander: Hey, private! What are you doing? Come here .
